DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety ziprasidone clozapine schizophrenic patient resistant and/or intolerant antipsychotic treatment
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Efficacy Tolerability Ziprasidone vs. Clozapine Treatment Schizophrenia Patients Who Continue Have Symptoms Can Tolerate Other Antipsychotic Drugs
DOC.criteria: CGI S ≥4 PANSS ≥ 80 Inpatients outpatients Patients history myeloproliferative disease , history granulocytopenia , agranulocytosis due drug Diagnosis substance dependence within previous 3 month use DSMIV criterion History seizure Organic mental disease , include mental retardation epilepsy
